name: patchbay
description: A fork of the brilliant cables.gl application for maintaining and extending it to build a new robust full-stack.

scripts.build:all: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run --filter @cables/cables build && pnpm run --filter @cables/ui build && pnpm run --filter @cables/electron build
scripts.patchbay:build:all: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run --filter @patchbay/bundle build && pnpm run --filter @patchbay/ui build
scripts.cables:build:all: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run --filter @cables/cables build && pnpm run --filter @cables/ui build && pnpm run --filter @cables/electron build
scripts.stack:start:local: COMPOSE_BAKE=true docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d
scripts.stack:down:local: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down && docker volume prune -a
scripts.directus:snapshot: pnpm --silent directus:exec npx directus schema snapshot > patchbay_snapshot.yaml
scripts.postgis:dump: pnpm --silent postgis:exec pg_dump --username admin patchbay > patchbay_db.sql
